Social Initiative Activities

Empowering our students to become responsible citizens through community service and social awareness.

Recent Social Initiatives

Our students actively participate in various social initiatives to contribute to community development and social welfare.

2023-24

Village Cleanliness Drive

Our students organized a cleanliness drive in the neighboring villages, cleaning public spaces and creating awareness about waste management and hygiene practices among villagers.

Community Impact Initiative
2023-24

Tree Plantation Campaign

As part of our environmental awareness program, students planted over 500 saplings in the school campus and surrounding areas, contributing to a greener environment.

Community Impact Initiative
2023-24

Digital Literacy for Village Elders

Our students conducted digital literacy sessions for village elders, teaching them basic smartphone operations, digital payments, and how to access government services online.

Community Impact Initiative
2023-24

Health Awareness Camp

In collaboration with local health authorities, our students organized a health awareness camp focusing on preventive healthcare, nutrition, and hygiene practices.

Community Impact Initiative

Our Social Programs

We engage in various social programs to instill values of social responsibility and community service in our students.

Environmental Conservation

Tree plantation, water conservation, and waste management initiatives

Community Service

Village cleanliness drives, assistance to elderly, and community development activities

Health & Hygiene

Health awareness camps, hygiene education, and preventive healthcare programs

Digital Literacy

Teaching digital skills to village elders and underprivileged communities

Educational Outreach

Tutoring underprivileged children from neighboring communities

Women Empowerment

Awareness programs on women's rights, education, and career opportunities

Rural Development

Initiatives to address rural development challenges and improve village infrastructure

Cultural Preservation

Documentation and preservation of local cultural heritage and traditions

Student Leadership in Social Initiatives

We believe in student-led social initiatives that empower them to identify community needs, plan interventions, and implement solutions. This approach not only benefits the community but also develops leadership, empathy, and problem-solving skills in our students.

Our Social Service Club coordinates these activities with guidance from faculty mentors. Students are encouraged to propose new initiatives based on their observations and interactions with the community.

Join Our Initiatives

We welcome community members, parents, and alumni to participate in and support our social initiatives.

Community Testimonials

What community members say about our social initiatives.

Ramesh Patil

Village Head, Devanahalli

"The cleanliness drive organized by the school students has transformed our village. Their enthusiasm and dedication have inspired our community members to maintain cleanliness."

Lakshmi Devi

Senior Citizen, Balepura

"At my age, I never thought I would learn to use a smartphone. Thanks to the digital literacy program by these young students, I can now video call my grandchildren and use digital payment apps."

Dr. Suresh Kumar

Medical Officer, PHC Devanahalli

"The health awareness camp organized by the school was extremely effective. The students' creative approach to communicating health information made a significant impact on the community."

Kittur Rani Chennamma

Kittur Rani Chennamma Residential School, Balepura, Devanahalli - Providing quality residential education for rural students.
